emuInput.TitMainTitle: Iota sorority pledges, seated from left: Geraldyne Johnson, Loretta Johnson, Allean Bridges; second row: Jo Ann Tucker, Delores Jackson, Phyllis Harper, Delores Parker, Jo Anne Neal; third row: Genevieve Finch, Mary Lou Brooks, Shirley Calhoun and Barbara Briggs posed in domestic interior with television and french doors
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper March 1, 1952, pg. 25, reads: "Future Iota Girls - This group of Iota pledgees had a very successful affair at Ammon Center recently and will be aides at annual Scholarship Tea at Loendi Sunday. Some of the members participated in the radio play which opened Crime Prevention Week when Hill City sponsored it. Left to right, seated, Geraldyne and Loretta Johnson and Allean Bridges. Second row: Jo Ann Tucker, Delores Jackson, Phyllis Harper, Delores Parker and Jo Anne Neal. Third row: Genevieve Finch, Mary Lou Brooks, Shirley Calhoun and Barbara Briggs. Not in the picture are Wilma Duncan, Effie Brown, Jacquelin Ross, Mary Mason and Gwendolyn Hamilton. - Harris Photo."
